Title: Day 6: 8:00 A.M. - 9:00 A.M.
Plot: Assad uses clever tactics to manipulate Fayed?s agent into leading them to the place where Fayed may be hiding. Ahmed uses Ray?s family as leverage to force him to deliver a mysterious package. Fayed contacts Wayne with a demand, while Sandra bucks the FBI?s authority. Jack becomes concerned when Curtis begins to display hostility toward Assad.
